1/2

data.text: @jm_pas_les_gens Hello, Sonia. We can assist to register your pet details. Please note that pet transport needs to be approved at least 48 hours prior to departure. Please forward your booking reference, pet details (breed, total weight pet + carrier bag & dimensions via DM. We await your reply.
